Name: Lucas Brauer
Title: User Experience Designer
About:
I am an interaction designer and information architect with a passion for solving design problems both large and small. I am immensely grateful for every day I have a chance to spend working to help people achieve their goals through design.

I got my start as a graphic designer working on editorial design for The Food Network Magazine. This experience serves as a guiding foundation in my current work as a user experience designer. Before coming to Smashing Boxes I was fortunate enough to do interaction and visual design in Washington, D.C. for a number of inspiring non-profit organizations including The National Brain Tumor Society, Greater Than AIDS, The Kaiser Family Foundation, Global Zero, and more.

My personal interests include everything even remotely related to information, interaction, and visual design, as well as backpacking, hiking, and playing ice hockey.
